thread.title: The Latest: Blatter’s lawyer says procedure not followed
thread.title_full: The Latest: Blatter’s lawyer says procedure not followed

author: wtopstaff
title: The Latest: Blatter’s lawyer says procedure not followed
text:
Home » News » Sports » The Latest: Blatter's lawyer… The Latest: Blatter’s lawyer says procedure not followed By The Associated Press October 8, 2015 7:58 am FILE - In this Friday, Dec. 19, 2014 file photo FIFA president Sepp Blatter and FIFA secretary general Jerome Valcke, left, leave after a press conference in Marrakech, Morocco. On Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 file photo FIFA provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and the former secretary general Valcke for 90 days. (AP Photo/Christophe Ena, File) 
ZURICH (AP) — The Latest from the FIFA investigation (all time local): 
___ 
12:50 p.m. 
Sepp Blatter’s lawyer says the FIFA ethics committee failed to follow the proper procedure when it decided to ban him for 90 days. 
Richard Cullen says Blatter was “disappointed that the ethics committee did not follow the code of ethics and disciplinary code, both of which provide for an opportunity to be heard.” 
Cullen also says the ethics committee based its decision on a “misunderstanding,” adding that the Swiss attorney general has not charged Blatter with a crime. Topics:
